wikipedia_page.main: Basil Samuel (1912–1987) was the founder of Great Portland Estates, one the United Kingdom's largest property businesses.

response: The Company was founded by Howard and Basil Samuel in 1959 to invest in properties originally developed by the Dukes of Portland. It was first listed on the London Stock Exchange later that year. It acquired the Ilex Estate in 1997. In 2007 the Company converted into a real estate investment trust.
*Basil Samuel (1912–1987), British founder of property company Great Portland Estates
